entry.title: Elevate 38 Sports Turf for Batting Cages (5mm Pad)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 2.69

Artificial Turf Description

Kodiak Elevate 38 sports turf with 5mm foam pad is made for batting cages and moderate traffic areas and continues to deliver a long term returns on investment at a moderate price point. It provides an excellent feel, durable 1/2" pile height and spring set yarn delivers traffic pattern resistance.

The foam backing offers additional padding and extends the life of the sports turf; as well as provides impact resistance for plyometric activities.

How to Order
  • Buy Pre-Cut Sizes online, Request a Quote for custom lengths, or call to place your order with a sales person
  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • Kodiak Elevate 38 rolls are 12' in width and cut to incrementally in length to the nearest foot, but can be custom made in 15' with minimum order requirements.
  • Minimum Order: 20' length (Shorter orders will not be accepted without calling in for authorization)
    Installation Options

    Kodiak Sports Installs Nationwide or we provide material for DIY

    Installation options

    • Full glue down
    • Seam only glue down
    • Seam only glue/seam tape
    • Factory Velcro seams
    Shipping Time

     

    Please allow 2.5 weeks for delivery to most areas of the lower 48 states.

entry.title: 23" x 23" x 8mm Strong Interlocking Rubber Tiles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 9.99 - 10.99 (3 variants)

5/16" (8mm) Interlocking Rubber Flooring Overview:

8 mm (5/16") Interlocking Rubber Floor Tiles are 23" x 23" x 8mm and are the most commonly applied thickness in commercial and residential gyms. Withstands general use and moderate vertical impact.

No glue required as the interlocking system is a loose lay product and is easily installed by a weekend warrior.

Each tile has 1" overlap on each interlock. Use the calculator feature to determine the necessary number of tiles. Call for questions or specifications.

Rubber Tile Specifications:

  • Tile Size: 23" x 23" x 5/16" (8mm)
  • Loss Per Interlock: 1" per tile (2 Tiles = 5'10")
  • Cutting Method: CNC Waterjet
  • Grade: Residential & Light Commercial
  • Warranty: 5-Year Defect

Typical Rubber Applications:

Fitness Centers, Physical Therapy Clinics, Chiropractic Clinics, Pet Training centers, Residential gyms, Laundry Rooms, Aisles, and Walkways.

entry.title: American Barbell Fixed Barbell (Rack Only)
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Barbell
Type: Fixed Barbell
Price: 645.00

American Barbell - Fixed Barbell Rack Only

The American Barbell Fixed Barbell Storage Rack is an A-Frame designed unit that supports up to 10 barbells. It is constructed from high-grade steel to provide the rugged durability that you need for many years of service.

The fixed barbell rack is commercial grade, heavy duty featuring bottom and top cross beams. The smooth matte black powder coating finish of this storage rack looks great while also ensuring that the unit does not scratch or chip when you are adding or removing barbells.

The American Barbell Fixed Barbell Storage Rack allows for both straight and EZ curl fixed weight barbells to be loaded onto it. The generous spacing of the barbell posts makes it easy to add or remove the weight plates. This rack allows you to conveniently and neatly store your fixed weight barbells while allowing easy access for users. I

Note: Fixed Barbells not included, must be purchased separately.

Specifications:

  • Heavy-duty frame

  • Holds 10 fixed weight barbells

  • A-Frame design

entry.title: American Barbell Chrome Performance Needle Bearing Bar 20KG, 28mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Barbell
Type: Bars
Price: 595.00

American Barbell Performance Needle Bearing Bar 20KG, 28mm

American Barbell's Performance Bearing Bar incorporates a host of proprietary features unlike any other on the market. It's with this technology our bars spin smoother as the weight gets heavier on the bar.

The bar shaft is made from precision ground alloy steel with a hard chrome coating. The strength of the shaft is tested with every shipment of raw material to ensure we have a consistent 190,000 PSI tensile strength. This attention to detail also allows for an excellent whip and long-term performance of our bars.

The bar sleeves are precision welded to eliminate failure. The weld is semi-concealed to not interfere with plates resting flush against the sleeve collar. Each sleeve is finished with a hard chrome coating for protection against dropping.  It also contains American Barbell’s proprietary concealed bearing system with higher load ratings than any bar available. A dust and chalk seal is also installed to protect and maintain longer bearing life.


Specifications
  • IWF Specification
  • Made in the USA
  • Incorporates American Barbell’s proprietary bearing technology
  • Higher load capacity and smoother rotation with heavier weights
  • Hard chrome coated sleeves to protect against dropping
  • Moderate corrosion resistance
  • Features a protective ring on inner collar side to keep chalk and dust from penetrating bearings
  • Warranty: Limited Lifetime

entry.title: 3' x 3' x 1/2" Everlock Commercial Grade Interlocking Tiles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type:
Price: 37.99 - 139.99 (21 variants)

3/8" (9.5mm) Kodiak Everlock Interlocking Rubber Tiles

Kodiak Everlock are the number one commercial tile for fitness centers and areas customer's need a beautiful tile with low odor and a very tight interlocking tile system.  The seams are almost invisible when interlocked and the commercial density creates a beautiful floor that is durable and easy to clean.

1/2" Thick rubber tiles are a common thickness used in heavy impact commercial fitness centers with general activities and moderate to higher vertical impact on the floor.

** Extremely high impact areas should use the Hammerlock line of vulcanized tiles available in 1/2" and 3/4" thick.

No glue is required for installation as the tiles are a loose lay product and can be installed easily by a weekend warrior.

The tiles are 3' x 3' x 1/2" with a 1" overlap on each interlock.  Use the calculator feature to help determine the total number of necessary tiles. Call for questions or specifications.

Rubber Tile Specifications:

  • Tile Size: 3' x 3' x 1/2"
  • Loss Per Interlock: 1" per tile (2 Tiles = 5'10")
  • Cutting Method: CNC Waterjet
  • Grade: Commercial
  • Warranty: 5 Years

Typical Rubber Applications:

Commercial Fitness Studios, High School & University Fitness Centers, Cross Fit, Physical Therapy Clinics, Chiropractic Clinics, Pet Training centers, Residential gyms, Basements, Garage

American Barbell Garage Rack

The American Barbell Garage Gym Rack is 48"W x 24"D and has 7 - 8'H options and an ideal choice for a home gym user restricted by limited floor space.   This rack is available in 3x3 11 gauge steel, and includes J-Hooks. 

Plastic protection on both sides of the J-Hooks helps protect the bar and uprights from scratching and wear.  It is easy to install, and is only 2' deep for a compact installation in tight spaces.  This simple, compact design provides you with 2 pieces of equipment in one, including a pull-up bar and squat stand. This piece has all of the characteristics of similar competitor "slim" racks, but with higher quality materials at a lower price point.

entry.title: American Barbell Series 4 Urethane Encased Fixed Curl Barbells
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Barbell
Type: Dumbbell
Price: 735.00 - 1225.00 (2 variants)

American Barbell - Series 4 Urethane Encased Fixed Curl  Barbell

American barbell is the premier dumbbell and barbell manufacturer in the nation in quality and durability. The all new commercial-grade Series 4 fixed curl barbells have a black textured urethane head, easy to read number increments in gray and a high-quality construction -- all at an affordable price point.

The series 4 barbell features a solid steel core, medium-strength hard chrome plated handle, and a high-grade urethane head. A larger radius on the outside and inside edges make this dumbbell comfortable to use in any exercise, specifically when the dumbbell comes in contact with your body.

American Barbell Series 4 barbells feature the high-grade German urethane is super tough and works well in any training environment that is not overly abusive. It is much more durable than a rubber dumbbell. Unlike rubber, urethane will never dry rot and is odorless. This fixed barbell is made to withstand controlled training environments for many years and is one of the highest quality offerings on the market today!

If heavy institutional abuse is imminent or training centers then consider the Series 1 fixed barbells, the ultimate in durability.

Specifications:
  • Handle Style: Curl, Medium Knurl
  • Tensile Strength: 90,000 PSI
  • Warranty: 5 Year Limited
  • Set Increments: 10 lbs
  • Sold in: Sets Only

entry.title: American Barbell Series 1 Round Heavy Commercial Urethane Encased Dumbbell
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Barbell
Type: Dumbbell
Price: 162.00 - 3975.00 (34 variants)

American Barbell - Series 1 Round Commercial Urethane Encased Dumbbells

MADE IN THE USA & PATENTED!

The Series I Dumbbell is American Barbell’s ultimate flagship product, and with more than 17 years of development, our 10th generation set of dumbbells lead the market in quality and performance. Here at American Barbell, we looked at every detail when developing this US patented dumbbell.

The dumbbell head features black textured premium-grade German urethane bonded to a solid steel core; with easy to read numbers in gray. It is designed to hold up in high use gym environments and does not show the wear and tear that gloss and non-textured urethane dumbbells show, ensuring that your dumbbells look as great as they perform over time. A larger radius on the outside and inside edges makes these dumbbells comfortable to use in any exercise, specifically when the dumbbell comes in contact with your body.

Add in the US made high-strength steel chrome-plated handle with great knurling that comfortably fits any hand, and you will know you are using the best dumbbell on the market today.

This dumbbell features our U.S. patented anti-loosening locking technology, making it the most durable and versatile on the market. With this technology, the dumbbell handle to head connection gets stronger the more it’s dropped.

Our premium German urethane is super tough and is bonded to the steel core; unlike the majority of dumbbells available today. Urethane will never dry rot and is odorless. This dumbbell is made to withstand the most severe training environments. There is no better set of dumbbells for sale on the planet.


Specifications:
  • Handle Style: Straight, Medium Knurl
  • Tensile Strength: 130,000 PSI
  • Grip Diameter:
    5-35 lbs - 32mm
    40-100 lbs- 35mm
  • Warranty: 5 Year Limited
  • Set Increments: 5 lbs
  • Sold in: Pairs & Sets Only

American Barbell Hex Dumbbell Rack 

The 2 and 3 tier American Barbell Hex Dumbbell Storage rack provides a flat rack space lined with rubber to safely keep your hex, 8 or 12 sided dumbbells.

Rated for home use, mid tier commercial and commercial gyms. The heavy-duty steel framing will handle the heaviest of dumbbells up to 130lbs.

The rubber liner provides a layer of protection to keep your dumbbells from being knicked/chipped.

The rack 48"L x 20"D(width) x 40"H. Each tier of this rack can be fixed in either a flat or slightly angled position, depending on how you want to access the weights.

The three tiers get narrower in width from the bottom to the top, so that you can place the heaviest weights on the bottom, with the lightest ones on the top tier.

The American Barbell 3 Tier hex dumbbell storage rack will keep your hexagonal dumbbells uniformly and compactly in place. The frame is finished in a premium urethane finish to keep it looking sharp.

American Barbell Premium Rubber Coated Grip Plates

IN STOCK NOW!

American Barbell Rubber Olympic Plates feature a cutting-edge plate design to handle the toughest of training environments. The four-hole grips allow for easy loading onto the bar, and they are a lot safer and more comfortable to hold than any other plate design.

entry.title: American Barbell Cerakote Women’s California Bar 15KG, 25mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Barbell
Type: Bars
Price: 279.99

American Barbell Women’s California Cerakote Bar 15KG, 25mm

The American Barbell women’s cerakote bar is our first dual-ring barbell built specifically for functional fitness female athletes. It has the nuances and sought after specifications of a top-quality 25mm weightlifting bar and is also durable enough to withstand daily use in other lifts and programs.

The Women’s Bar is finished with Cerakote for a look, feel, and performance that is unparalleled in the fitness industry today. The bar shaft is made from precision ground alloy steel and the strength of the shaft is tested with every shipment of raw material to ensure we have a consistent 190,000 PSI tensile strength. This attention to detail also allows for excellent whip and long-term performance of our bars.

The bar sleeves are precision machined and each sleeve is coated with hard chrome for protection against dropping and impact. Sleeves rotate around high strength composite bushings used in aircraft and automotive industries for smooth rotation.

Cerakote Finish

Cerakote finished bars offer the best corrosion and abrasion resistance of any bar finish. Cerakote is used by major firearm manufacturers around the world in some of the most abusive and corrosive environments. Corrosion salt spray testing has shown that this coating lasts as much as 70x longer than chrome and even stainless steel.

American Barbell's design team has been producing innovations in bar technology for more than 18 years, and this is one of our most exciting accomplishments. Every type of bar finish has its story, and we’ve determined that our California Bar is unrivaled.

Specifications
  • Product Code: OB15-SP
  • IWF Specification
  • Warranty: Limited Lifetime
